QuestData.Title: Flight in the Firelands
QuestData.Description: $n, our enemy is using this grotto in the Firelands to prepare an invasion. We're going to hit them hard right where they live.$B$BBut first, you'll need to get your wings. Flight in the Firelands does not work as it does in the outside world. Something about the dense, superheated air. You'll need some practice!$B$BGet a Twilight Firelance from the rack behind me, equip it, then mount one of Aviana's Guardians. Practice flying - flap your wings! Visit a flag placed on the ledge below and return.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get and equip a Twilight Firelance using the rack behind Farden. Mount one of Aviana's Guardians and fly her to the Guardian Flag on the ledge below. Press the flap button to flap your mount's wings!
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you feel comfortable flying yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done! How does it feel?$B$BIt is challenging to master flight in this burning wasteland, but it is the only way.$B$BI hope you're ready for battle, $n...
